title: requests from malicious scripts
extract: There is no end to the type and variety of malicious URL requests. ... Malicious scripts generally seek one of two things: A resource that can be used to gain access and/or compromise security. A process vulnerability triggered by malicious request and used to gain access.
extract_html: There is no end to the type and variety of malicious URL requests. ... Malicious scripts generally seek one of two things: A resource that can be used to gain access and/or compromise security. A process vulnerability triggered by malicious request and used to gain access.
